website_summaries.verdict: Commercial lightweight canister vacuum cleaner that is great for cleaning large areas as well as tight spaces.
pros: Includes a reusable commercial cloth bag with paper option
Strong built-in blower offers more versatility for cleaning and maintaining a cleaner home
Does good job cleaning curtains, drapes, upholstery, and hard-to-reach areas inside vehicles
cons: New design might not be favorable to some, it's not great on wood floors, and the long cord gets tangled sometimes
Only good for light home use, not for heavy-duty jobs or on carpeting

customer_reviews.title: No suction/not commercial grade
customer_reviews.text: You will desperately fall in love with the convenience and compact design of this vacuum. And if you have actual commercial needs and expecting commercial grade suction you will be swiftly disappointed. I am a professional office cleaner in New England. I was thrilled with how easy it was to move this vacuum around but it won't vacuum any of the rock salt, no hair, misses most dirt. It's a glorified duster at best. Missed cob webs on walls too though. The cord clip kept falling off too. (I only used the bRand New machine for one cleaning day: 8hours). Not sure why it's an amazon pick.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these vacuums for over 10 years. The new gray ones that they are shipping are WORTHLESS........ The hoses won't stay in them, they are lasting about a month and I am having to take them in for repairs. The new CH30000 vacuums are AWFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Warren

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find a portable vac at a reasonable price. We have a large home, all wood and tile floors. I have arthritis and was looking for a vac that I could handle. Sure, it's light in weight. It worked great for about a week. Now, it constantly clogs, has lost its suction power, and the door does not stay shut. I have cleaned filters, tried the disposable bags and even used our air compressor to try to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. White

customer_reviews.title: I am definitely not pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: After opening up the box this vacuum does not seem to be to the quality of other Hoover vacuums I have had. The disposable bags are just a bag and one has to purchase an adapter for them to work ... this is not even stipulated in the booklet with vacuum or with the package of bags. The "reusable" bag does not seem to be made of a material to keep dust and dirt in ... it is made in such a way that it has holes in it. I am definitely not pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Strgte54

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum nearly 10 months ago and use it daily. I clean houses for a living and vacuuming dog hair off hardwoods is faster and easier than sweeping. Sweeping blows dust and hair everywhere. This vacuum sucks it up fast and cuts my work time in half, getting under and behind furniture. I have seen "bad reviews" on this vacuum and could not understand why until I tried using the disposable paper bags. There is NO suction if you use the "paper" bags! You must use the "cloth" bags to get the amazing suction this vacuum gives me to clean homes.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Noxious "burning plastic" odor
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner had a horrible burning plastic odor that irritated my nose and lungs. I tired to air it out by running the vacuum outdoors for a while, but I couldn't get rid of the odor. It has good suction, but the burning plastic smell emitted by this vacuum is not likely good for one's health. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy J

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Edit: received my replacement and it works great! I work for a cleaning company and we use this vacuum and he performed so well that I decided to buy one for my home. I don’t know if this is a newer model or what but it’s horrible! It’ll suck up pet hair and that’s it! It just pushes anything that weighs more than pet hair! Please save your money and try a different brand! I love the ones we use for work, the suction is great with them but the one I just purchased is awful! I am looking into how to return it after I post this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item 10/4/2016. it caught on fire ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 10/4/2016. it caught on fire 7/10/17. The lightweight gray canister didn't even last 1 year. The cord split at the top and then shorted causing it to catch on fire. It was poorly made. Thank God no one got burned or killed. I believe it has a two warranty I guess I will see. Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. We bought for an RV. It can litterally go right over dirt and not pick it up. It is more of a shovel just pushing dirt around. Owned one prior that died after years of great use. Another product bites the dust. Well moves it around anyway. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Collins

customer_reviews.title: no suction.
customer_reviews.text: i cannot get this vacuum to pick up stray cat litter off a tile floor. i cannot get it to do the most simple things. if you buy this, plan on spending every other ten minutes of vacuuming in de-clogging the tubes, and emptying the bag to keep the minimal level of suction going. i wanted something light weight and convenient, but forget it. either i'm doing something drastically wrong or it's garbage and i should have gone with a new dyson or miele. question: why can't this country make a decent vacuum cleaner and a decent toaster oven? is it really so much to ask?
customer_reviews.author: Daisy K.

customer_reviews.title: A different way to vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is just the thing for maintaining my multilevel townhouse. I purchased the carry-case for the accessories too. Slide the strap over my shoulder & I can easily vacuum the whole place in no time. It is lightweight, easily carried up stairs with my hands free to guide the lightweight wand-like head. The always-attached extra long power cord enables me to do nearly the whole place without relocating the plug. Though it doesn't have the power-head that makes large area carpet cleaning easier with other vacuums,it still gets up crumbs and tracked in dirt just fine...and the ease of use ensures I will do it more often anyhow!
customer_reviews.author: V Legore

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I wish it sucked harder
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these at an old job, and bought this one for my own house and cleaning on my own time. I love it! I wish it sucked harder, but in reality it does great for the size and especially price. Not a deal breaker for me at all, as it gets the job done. I'm just spoiled by my work's $500 canisters that could suck your face off.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: SMH. Lower quality than older models.
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, this newer model of the Hoover PortaPower is lighter weight. I sold my older model when I bought a Dyson cordless which crapped out after 6 months. Immediately you notice that the accessories don't quite fit the extension tube (especially the baseboard nozzle) which has to mean poor suction and definitely means poor maneuverability. It's another disappointment from Hoover (I really liked my Hoover Air Cordless until the wheels fell off and I discovered a poorly made undercarriage was documented all over the Internet and the vacuum repair shop said you couldn't purchase just those shoddily made parts).
customer_reviews.author: MickeyMouth

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Disregard the naysayers here, this is my second Commercial Portapower. My first lasted for about 6 years and still working. I was skeptical about this purchase because of the few negative comments. This machine works great and cleans our 1000 sq. ft. cottage with ease. We have 2 cats and they are always shedding on the hardwood floors and love to deposit cat hair in our Persian area rugs. This machine cleans up those cat hairs with ease. It's very light and I strap it on "crossbody" style. Amazon has the best price I found anywhere, and my purchase here was less than I paid for this machine 6+ years ago on Ebay.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money on this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum Based on the reviews. This is absolutely the worse vacuum I have ever purchased! The bag to deal with is a pain in the @$$ and even after cleaning it well it has no suction power at all and there is no clog in the hose at all. Please save your money and in another brand/vacuum unless you want to throw your money away and have to buy another one in less than 2 months of home use.
customer_reviews.author: ryan laninfa

customer_reviews.title: 20 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: OK so I have been cleaning houses for 20 years now and I wouldn't use anything else. I worked for Mary maids when I first started cleaning. They used these vacuums and that's how I found them. Best investment ever hands down!!! I have owned two of them in 20 years and still work great!!! I read some of the reviews and was shocked that anyone would be disappointed with this product. swear by them! They also turn into great blowers for blowing leaves or whatever needs blowing! LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - No suction power
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset that I wasted my money and did not return this product. It has no suction power and does not work on carpet or mats (any pile - low, high or medium) at all and the main head is plastic just garbage. Overall, it's just a cheap product. Right now, it's in my closet but going to throw it in the dumpster. Smdh!
customer_reviews.author: riggs

customer_reviews.title: Motor is shot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum 2 yets ago. Loved it. Great suction, great attachments, light weight. The other day it began to make a funny noise so I took it to a vacuum repair place. Bad motor. It would cost me too much to repair to bother. Should have lasted way longer than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fahy

customer_reviews.title: Hardworking Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have the 30-year old (plus) version of this same vacuum. It was time to get a newer one. This is one hardworking machine! It is simply perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent lightweight vacuum -- am still
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to replace 2 older model Hoover PortaPower Lightweight vacuums (had a white one and a grey-tinged one). Same size and similarly lightweight but seems suction in this upgrade is a bit weaker. Longer cord is great, but would be nicer if it could wrap around the handle for easier storage/transport. Comes with more attachments that I will ever need. Would buy again for its lightweight and compact size but the retro-looking metrovac (Restoration Hardware used to sell them) has much stronger suction and is similarly sized.
customer_reviews.author: J Hath

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very practical.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hunch that the pros used these vacuums for a good reason, and not the kind of thing we see in normal residential use. For the money, the performance is just great. The light weight and long wand can reach places that are impossible for non-canister vacuums. It has pleased me every use. Might be somewhat inferior to larger upright vacuums for normal carpet, but as an all-a-rounder its performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on performance and is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and suction is great. Not sure why a few others have commented on poor suction unless they are expecting molecular level vacuuming?? I use this vacuum for cleaning my kids’ school gym indoor bleachers...turns a 45 minute sweeping job into just 10 minutes and doubles the quality. Love the washable and reusable filter but ideally it could be bigger. Multiple nozzles are a plus and the 30’ cord is handy.
customer_reviews.author: James Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing and is super easy to put together. I love how light weight it is and that it has a shoulder strap. Works great on carpet and hardwood. The only thing is I wish there was a really wide open attachment that didn't have bristles. Also if there is a lot of hair in your floor prepare to have to remove it from the bristles while vacuuming. It only takes a few seconds though if you do it while the vacuum is on. But none the less this is a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Get Oneit's great!
customer_reviews.text: We own over ten vacuums because we use one on each floor. We have one in the garage and at my business. This vacuum is hands down amazing! Works great! Bought all the attachments with it. Bags,cone, regular bags,etc. It really gets the job done with pet hair it's great. In our RV it gets everything up. I will get a second one as this one stays on our RV now. Get one you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zeus Automotive Repair

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I’ve had a cleaning business for 26 years and this has always been my go to vacuum for hard floors, steps, and upholstery. I also use it to detail cars (my own and for work too). I would give it a five star review if the hose hadn’t broken after only using it 5 times. I super glued it and I keep a spare from my old vacuum in the car when I go to work just in case it breaks again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele_Indy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction!
customer_reviews.text: I had this vacuum years ago and it was terrific! The new model doesn’t have enough suction and barely gets dirt off of hardwood floor. Forget about picking up pet hair. The hose is way too short. There is no option of using a bag even though it is advertised as being able to change out the bagless feature for a bag. So I wasted money buying the bags for this vacuum. I don’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Todaro

customer_reviews.title: I'd say this vacuum sucks but that would be a compliment I guess
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! Whatever you do, don't buy! Worst vacuum I've ever had and now I'm stuck with it. Amazon won't return! The suction is terrible...it won't even work on carpets, and barely works on hardwood. It's chunky and strains your neck w/in minutes. No idea where these good reviews are coming from. I had a friend try it they thought it was a joke. Too bad I'm stuck w/it:/
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hubble

customer_reviews.title: Great on hardwood floors!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for the maneuverability and does a great job on my hardwood floors. I would not recommend for carpeting. I only have area rugs, and it does an ok job on those. It’s lightweight and easy to use, in large areas and tight spaces. Easy to use for cleaning out our camper as well. We have 2 dogs and it keeps up with dog hair quite well. Overall, I would recommend this vacuum if you don’t have carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: steve woisin

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Portability is not great. It's cumbersome, and very heavy to carry on your shoulder. It's horrible for even the lightest vacuuming, suction is blah and the cord is so twisted it's hard to use. There's no way to get it untwisted because it doesn't swivel. Also the hose is far too short . The only thing I like is the small floor attachment for getting underneath and behind things. I would not recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: scrapnkath

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vac. It replaces same vac that I had for at least 18 years or more. This is exactly the same as the one I had except for the hose that connects to the vac itself. There has been a great change in that item and I do not like the new design. In certain instances it would work out well but for the most part the old design is best. I still have old hose and it is as good a new. Now I have a choice, that is good. If this vac lasts like my old one did it would be marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: MsMac

customer_reviews.title: Best portable vac ever
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these for a professional cleaning company. I had to buy one for myself. Nothing compares to this Hoover. Awesome for getting the job done. Lightweight and long enough power cord to go all around my house without having to plug in each room. Reaches high for ceiling fans and cobwebs and maneuvers underneath tight furniture spaces no problem. Definitely worth the money for this product.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning business and I use it a lot. It has a long cord so you don't have to unplug it in every room. This is a great vacuum cleaner! I highly recommend it. Buy it with the bag so you can carry every attachment with you. it's very convenient when you have everything right there (vacuum stairs, edge etc)
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made for my cleaning business
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this little Hoover. I clean houses and everyone has a dog. Any hard surface floor I sweep with this. It gets every little bit of hair and that’s not easy. The cloth bag is great. I keep it cleaned out and sweep the bag out too. My Hoover is used daily and one cloth bag lasts me a year and then I get a new one. It is one of my best buys for my business. Great for cleaning out your car as well. I’m so very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Sue Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE THIS VACUUM. If you have a lot of flooring to vacuum to get done, try one of these commercial vacs....this is the 1st time I bought something like this. I have always had the upright models, or cordless, 1 Dyson. This is powerful, light enough to carry around and get the job done fast. The small bag inside fits a lot of stuff... I feel like I'm not having to empty after each room. I have 3 pets, so making sure it is strong enough to pick up animal hair is important to me, and this one gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: T Har

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use, not as advertised....I gave mine away for free....
customer_reviews.author: Rut42

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience, but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the convenience of navigating my steps. For that purpose, I give this five stars. However, the suction/p owner is not the best. I am surprised at Hoover. Therefore, I deducted one star. This machine straps across the body effortlessly and is lightweight. The cord is also generous. I can do the entire downstairs and two flights of stairs without unplugging.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile economy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the best at what it does, but for the money it's pretty darned good. For a dorm dweller certainly money better spent than a cheap upright with impossible attachments from the closest big box. Parents had this while I was growing up and it worked fine - and still does. This is great for small areas and small jobs and doesn't require extra storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Springbok

customer_reviews.title: Great for move ability
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s, very easy to vacuum high places easily reaches hard areas under furniture. Light weight will recommend this item. Con’s, does not have the option of hepa disposable bags, comes with a cloth bag that is not that easy to clean, I ordered the attachment for disposable bags it’s hard plastic and allows air to escape which you lose suction power. And you lose a lot of waste capacity. Also more attachments would be nice,
customer_reviews.author: Shelia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful vacuum in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Very effective vacuum for hardwood, laminate, carpet stairs, and furniture. It's really easy to move from one area to the next without being hung up or constantly worrying about the cord getting in the way. You carry the vacuum and the cord stays behind you the whole time. I really like the attachments that are included but what's better is how they lock into place. It's not like most vacuums that just slide one end into the other. These attachments actually lock into place and will not come free when you are using them. The bag is reusable which is also a nice bonus. Overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not commercial grade,.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who has a housecleaning business. She has a 5 year old one(this model) that works well. This new one DOES NOT! Very poor suction, very noisy motor. This is NOT a comercial grade machine. Sorry Hoover, thisbis a fail
customer_reviews.author: brainfart3

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read a lot of good reviews from it, unfortunately passed 30 days, and now I can’t return. It just doesn’t work, suction is poor, it barely gets from floor. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: douglas silva

customer_reviews.title: Great handy vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love my hand carry vacuum. I strap it around my shoulders and vacuum the corners of the room ceiling, all the edges around the floorboards and small messes children make. It's easy and convenient. Much faster than pulling out the large vac that doesnt get any corners or under items. I vacuumed my entire bedroom that had feathers all over the carpet and under the bed. Worked awesome! Great for small spaces and hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: JadeMercury

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: If you are one of those maids who gets excited about cool efficient cleaning supplies then get this vacuum. The cord is long and tough. The suction is amazing, but I use the smaller of the long floor attachments for better performance. It does get a little heavy after a while but that's when I put it on a skateboard and drag it behind me. The bag holds a lot of trash, filters great and doesn't seem to hold smells. It's a great vacuum. I've paid more money for far worse products.
customer_reviews.author: TeaTime

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a HOOVER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at a convention with low-pile carpet. First thing out of the box, the shoulder strap broke. We used it anyway, but the suction was horrible and the little tracking wheels were useless. I missed the 30-day window to return to Amazon, as we did not open or use this until the convention. I contacted HOOVER, but was told that since Amazon had sold the item, they could not help me. Really? The box does not say Amazon; it says HOOVER. I am flabbergasted that HOOVER does not stand behind its product. Don't buy HOOVER . . .
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great suction lots of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best small vacuum cleaner I've ever owned,. I only rate products that are great, and the ones that stink. There is one small flaw to the design of the machine. You must empty the bag, as it is not replaceable, meaning that you will be exposed to any germs in the dusty refuse within the bag. Accordingly, wear gloves and a mask when doing so. If they made the bags disposable and replaceable, this would be a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Raptorman

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my cleaning business. I use it for all hard surface floors. It cleans very good. My clients love their clean floors. I have been using this porta vac for over 8 years. I do have to buy a new one every 2 years. But its worth it. I have tired overs and wasn't happy.
customer_reviews.author: Foxj98

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! Very loud and the suction is terrible. The carpet attachment does not have a roller and thusly can’t actually pick up anything embedded in the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Stedman

customer_reviews.title: This unit doesn't seem to have
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd unit of this vacuum cleaner and the previous 2 units had very good suction. This unit doesn't seem to have that great of suction... I have replaced the cloth bag with a lighter weight one thinking that would help and it didn't. I also don't care for the hose on newer units as they are like accordions. I liked the older hose that was stretched out and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: It works okay
customer_reviews.text: My little Oreck from years ago had better suction and was easier to handle. The cord on this is ridiculously long and thick so it is just awkward to walk around with. The suction is adequate but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Thin Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: After using a previous version of this product for many years I have found this present version much improved over the old one. The suction is fantastic and the tools are adequate for the jobs that they were designed for. Con: The only problem that I found is that the rug to floor switch does not work and is poorly designed. The handle of the vac should be taller so that the cord can be wrapped around it like the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Carrasquillo

customer_reviews.title: got what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weight and has great suction. Our new home is 80% hard floors and some high ceilings and I am not a very good sweeper. Came with alot of attachments. The hose stretches out great and is very flexible. OMG and the cord is the best, I have not gone too far on one level of our home that I had to move the plug!!
customer_reviews.author: J. mueller

customer_reviews.title: Weak suction for carpet
customer_reviews.text: Received a day late but in time to provide it to my grandparents. I unboxed the vacuum and its accessories to make it easier for them and gave it a try in my own home. I found the results to be lackluster. I am Shark vacuum guy, but this may suit the needs of my grandparents. If they enjoy it and find it meets their needs, I’ll provide an update... until then, I wouldn’t recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sween

customer_reviews.title: Great to walk around with
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability of this vacuum, but the rug attachment just doesn't seem to suck up the dirt that well, and it doesn't rotate. I'd like a rotary attachment for this particular mode.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for dusting and cleaning wood/vinyl floors
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for dusting and cleaning wood/vinyl floors. My mom had one of these that was orange and I had been looking for one but went for a different brand at a local vac shop. That one worked ok but finally died so I got this one and haven't been let down. It has great suction and metal wands versus the plastic ones I had. I also like the locking attachments that actually keep them on when you are reaching for something. I do wish there was a way to store the pieces though, but that's a small gripe for this vac.
customer_reviews.author: Ken78

customer_reviews.title: Use to be a great product
customer_reviews.text: We have used Hoover PortaPower for over 15 years in our business and our recent purchase of this machine has already quit working after a month of purchasing it. It seems to have a short it in. We have vacuum's that are the same thing well over 7 years old and still running great. Disappointed if this is the quality of the product now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hagensick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It has almost no suction. It took me about five minutes to vacuum a rug. It won't pick up anything of any weight at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: not the best suction with the floor attachment
customer_reviews.text: bougth this for the main purpose of vacumming hardwood and tile floors. I don't care for the floor attachment. This would be great to vacuum your car out or the couches but I'm not happy with its ability to vacuum hard surface floors. Years and years ago talking 20 plus I used this type of vacuum and it worked great. Something has changed and not for the better. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: I sprinkled fine salt around the edge of the wall and corner ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received this I used it right away, I sprinkled fine salt around the edge of the wall and corner it sucked it right up also have a rug with fringe on the ends this worked great without tearing up the fringe!! Coming with the waist band works out best for me as with neck and shoulder issues. Such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Doney

customer_reviews.title: Great product to carry anywhere you want with the powerful performance for both carpet & floors
customer_reviews.text: I got Hoover only because I used Hoover before, & I was very happy with the product. I bought this particular one because I was replacing portable similar product. Only thing I don’t like is the LOCK for bag compartment to close; I’ll see if it gives any trouble later on. So far this new vacuum is working Great!!!! Picking up dirt & dust efficiently. No Complain there after all its Hoover. Hope it’ll last years like the the previous one lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the lack of suction power.
customer_reviews.text: Long cord, helpful attachments, easy to use. Sadly, I am very disappointed by the lack of suction power. It was advertized as being for commercial use, but it barely works as a single-owner house cleaning product and misses so much debris upon use. I can't imagine professionals thinking this product would serve them well. It doesn't have even a fifth of the suction power I've seen from other commercial-grade vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Junk

customer_reviews.title: Don['t buy this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Tips over when you pull it . The hose won't relax. The cord is very difficult to wind up. Stays kinked all the time. As long is it is the kink in the cord gets stuck on everything. The fridge, kitchen chairs, around corners. I hate this old model . I pulled my old one out. Now I am using that one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 8 months it became really loud... ...
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months it became really loud...contacted Hoover by email and never heard from them...took it to a vacuum shop and they told me is the motor...they said this new model doesn't really last that long...so if you're thinking of getting one ...it won't last more than 2 years before the motor gives up..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little Vacuum with a Powerful Punch!
customer_reviews.text: Great Little Vacuum! I use mine to vacuum ceiling fans, small dry spills, ceiling, cob webs, and baseboards. This little machine has quite a bit of power. It's convenient to wear cross body. Being able to wear this little gadget makes it very easy to use and maneuver. The cord is long, the attachments are many, and the power is plentiful. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: CaliReader

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not commercial
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this vacuum for almost two years. In the beginning it worked fine. Nothing special. I recently started a bathroom renovation which included removal of walls and drywall. The room was covered but there was still a lot of dust everywhere. At the end of each day I would vacuum to make sure things didn't get out of hand. The problem is it doesn't pick up fine dust at all. My floors are covered in a fine dust that won't go away. So I'm reviewing this product while I'm shopping for a new vacuum. So disappointed. If they market this item as commercial it should pick up fine dust.
customer_reviews.author: kat64

customer_reviews.title: Very industrial looking
customer_reviews.text: The cord is stiff. The tubes are hard steel so be careful you don't knick furniture with them. The attachments are lackluster. It doesn't have an option from the manufacturer for disposable bags. There are after market bags and conversion attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Windycitydew

customer_reviews.title: convenient size and good power
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful for size, its a very old design but sturdy and good build. Sucks up pet hair and everything I need it for. nice to have stainless steel tubes instead of those flexible plastic ones. The clip connector of hose to main unit is a little fiddly and doesn't look substantial so will be keeping an eye on that but otherwise its been a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scotamazon

customer_reviews.title: Love my vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: Love my vaccuum. I didn't buy the disposable bags and use only the bag that is supplied (cloth receptacle). I keep my shop vac outside to periodically suck out all of the dust and clean the bag. Using this method, the vaccuum works great. I've tried the disposable bags but the suction power went down. I'm using this to vaccuum wood floors and mostly dust and small particles. For anything bigger I don't think it would be powerful enough but for basic daily dusting, baseboard cleaning, etc, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Beadweaver

customer_reviews.title: Liberated from clunky canister at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Light on the shoulder, easy to maneuver, hose is well-designed so that the accordion section contracts when distance is not needed, very simple bag system, good suction for low-pile and bare floors. Metal wand is what separated this from another that was all plastic. And best of all, a crazy long cord. A bargain. Can't believe I dragged around a heavy canister all these years.
customer_reviews.author: RF Winans

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find it again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vac to replace same model that is about 30 years old. So happy to find it again. Love the washable reusable bag, 33' cord and POWERFUL pickup. Newer model has metal connections rather than plastic as my old one. Old one still has great power but some of plastic parts have worn out. The option to also use as a blower is great when needed. I use this for almost whole house tile floors - far better than my Dysen.and weight is easy to manage. Skip Shark and all the others - this is THE best for home or professional cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: homeshopping

customer_reviews.title: Works even on short nap rugs
customer_reviews.text: I have used it several times now and finds it does a good job on tile, short nap rugs and wood floors. I do not think it has a strong enough suction for a commercial use or shag rugs. It is to be carried over your shoulder on a strap, but as I have rugs in most rooms I usually just drag it behind me. It does not have wheels. It does have many attachments you can use.
customer_reviews.author: benjean

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacuuming hard floors and stairs
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for about a year and I love it! I use it to vacuum my hardwoods and stairs. So much dust just picks up while sweeping that vacuuming is just better. I also vacuum out the sofas with the attachment for upholstery and the corners with the crevice tool. I've only had to replace the hose and bought an extra bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good suction and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Long cord allows use of vacuum on large areas of hardwood floors without having to change plug outlet. Light weight allows vacuum to be held as opposed to using the strap (that does not have a shoulder pad). Suction is good and vacuum appears to be well made. Attachment for cleaning tight areas does not connect tightly with metal pipe but it does attach well to the flexible hoes. At first glance, the flexible hoes looks too short but its accordion style allows it to be stretched out sufficiently so as to vacuum blinds and window wells. The unit performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 1 because its not lightweight and the bag is a fabric bag that needs to be vacuumed after each use. Also the disposable bags you can buy for it wont stay in place. Would send it back but too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: This item far exceeded what I was expecting. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This item far exceeded what I was expecting. I owned on years ago and gave it to a friend when I moved, stupidly thinking any vacuum could take its place....BIG mistake. The suction this vac has surpasses anything out there as far as I am concerned. Over the years I never forgot how this Hoover held up and out performed any other. One day while on Amazon, I looked it up thinking perhaps they didn't make these any more...what I huge surprise when I saw the industrial version of this model with a strap and heavy duty LONG cord. Needless to say I use it everywhere and anywhere. The amount of attachments is outstanding also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they went cheap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to replace an older and dearly loved Portapower that died unexpectedly. I did not hesitate to purchase a replacement because the original was so good, but am very disappointed by the new version. What I loved about the portapower that I had originally had was its sturdy power cord (the new version twists, tangles and kinks), was sturdy and quiet (the new version is louder and has a cheap feeling). I deeply regret my purchase - and even more that I waited to long to return it! Hoover - bring back the quality version of this please!
customer_reviews.author: Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: . Would pay extra to get a quieter model but no real complaints. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry and move around. Very long cord, nice. Enough section. Affordable. A little on the loud side. Would pay extra to get a quieter model but no real complaints. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Henry Willette

customer_reviews.title: Love this little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight, quality attachments, easy to empty bag. Excellent for anyone who lacks strength to push a typical, heavy vacuum sweeper. Great for stairs and hard to reach spots. On a hot day, vacuum gets a little hot when wearing it over your shoulder, but not too bad. I loved this so much a bought a second one. My only suggestion for improvement is that they provide a padded strap for your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good product for an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a while. Hoover plastic parts are thin and crack easily, but with typical household use this vac will last for a while, and gets the job done with corners and edge attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE ATTACHMENT METHOD
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vac for years and I love it. I use it for bare floors and for dusting. My problem is trying to change the brush or extensions with this crazy round ring instead of a snap together. Right now it is stuck together and I can't get it apart. I want to use the brush and can't.
customer_reviews.author: ROSELYN TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction, like the metal parts
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because you could feel the quality of construction. While a bit heavier than similar hand held multi purpose vacuums, the solid construction was great. The suction was a bit weaker than a comparable Oreck, however the other brand blew air out the back which the Hoover did not.
customer_reviews.author: Mpls Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction and power with large price tag!
customer_reviews.text: Did not use until now so lost my window of return. I was told how amazing this vacuum was, on hardwood floors, stairways and autos. Suppose to have great power and suction so worth the money. It barely suctions anything. I bought this for my carpeted stairway and my vehicles. Worked so poorly I had to bring out my large vacuum and redo the job. Very disappointed and out a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: lynnette faunce

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for housekeepers!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum made so easy to clean the house! Everyone should buy this ! It’s so lightweight and has very good suction ! You will not regret ! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Diaz

customer_reviews.title: A very rugged little vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I have had an older version of this vacuum since 1978 and it still works perfectly. Bought the second one for the basement. A real quality unit perfect for autos, stairs and other hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Pros vs Cons
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Hoover this afternoon. So far, I've done my vents, carpeted stairs and hardwood downstairs flooring. Pros and cons Pros: •Good suction •Well made •Metal vs plastic hose •Great for stairs Cons: •tedious to carry around for large areas •hose attachments are hard plastic, if you weren't carful attaching it could break All in all the pros heavily outweigh the cons!
customer_reviews.author: Ali G

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the suction on this vacuum. However, it's lightweight but made if good materials, has nice attachments, and the metal hose with two lengths is nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bdock

customer_reviews.title: Good vac
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It's lightweightsnd very easy to use. There is always one thing wrong with each one I've bought though. I'm on my third one. This time it was the latch which holds the door shut. The second didn't last as long as the first. That lasted 10 years!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Well made and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a life saver! I'm almost 65 years old, and keeping hard to reach areas clean gets more challenging with every year. I needed something light weight with strong suction and attachments to clean things like, behind the refrigerator, ceiling fans, con webs, spider webs, clean couches, under cushions, etc. This vacuum does it all! Highly recommend you give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: GrndmaNan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I own a cleaning company and I’ve absolutely loved them! I have bought 3 of these vacuums! I’ve had them for 2 years now. They’re so light and convenient. So much more easier to maneuver around with it. Also so much easier to vacuum stairs and hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hern

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum was great until this week when it started smelling like the ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was great until this week when it started smelling like the motor is burning up. We got this January 5, 2018 and now it's March 26, 2018. We kept the bag cleaned it and never allowed it to get completely full before emptying it. We used it several times a day as we have two dogs, but as a commercial hand vac, I expected it to be able to handle this amount of use. Time to file a warranty claim. By the way, the picture shows a black vacuum, but the one we received is gray.
customer_reviews.author: Steboo

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning house(s)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this product and I love it. I highly recommend it to anyone. It works great and is amazing for cleaning the house. My first one last 3 years and I just bought it again. Highly satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sintia Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the vacuum cleaner. It’s light enough to carry around and with a 33 foot cord. The attachments are great. The suction is also better than any floor vacuum cleaner we have ever owned. Would highly recommend this vacuum cleaner. The packaging was adequate but the shipping got screwed up. Overall it’s a nice cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Clover Agnello

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Save your $$
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this vacuum. The soldering on the wand attachment broke off on my 3rd time using it, now I have to manually hold it together while vacuuming. Have barely any suction power, and the attachments are LOW QUALITY plastic, just waiting on them to break. Major regret!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! I love this vacuum. I have a tightly-packed office and bedroom and this makes the job soooo easy. It's got great tools, great features, and is just a wonderful benefit to anyone needing to maneuver in a room that is a challenge to clean. This is my second Hoover vacuum and I can't say enough good things about the equipment and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Marse

customer_reviews.title: It has good suction. I like all the accessories
customer_reviews.text: I have used only a couple of times. It has good suction. I like all the accessories. There is one for every application, especially the ceiling fan. It's light weight and I like using it on the stairs. One thing I would suggest is putting a padded insert on the shoulder strap, or a better quality shoulder strap. Perfect for a motor home.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Necesary Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I would give this item 5 stars but for some miner design flaws that required correction before the vacuum worked as intended. The wand would not connect to the hose as the hose fitting was about a papers width small and required sanding to a proper size. The floor attachment would not go to the "bare floor" position, loosening the holding screw allowed it to be positioned correctly. This may not be a permanent solution.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M. James

customer_reviews.title: hose is too stiff
customer_reviews.text: We had another vacuum that we'd had for years. We replaced it with this and have been very disappointed. The hose is so stiff that after short time it came apart where it attaches. We've gone back to using old hose on the new vacuum. The hose needs to be more pliable and not so stiff.
customer_reviews.author: GrandBuffet

customer_reviews.title: Looks Used... Packaging Jammed at Bottom of box!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum seems fine. I’m concerned that it looked used. Only the beater bar was in the original packing. The rest of it was jammed at the bottom of the box. Parts seem cheap-plastic is thin... I did injection molding at one part of my career. This concerns me as I wonder how well this until will wear? Stars are lower as quality seems off and the used feel I got by the way it was jammed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Lightwieght
customer_reviews.text: Nice product wished it would had more suction power. Returned. I have another Hoover the Cyclone SH40050RM it has been excellent and powerful. I don't like writing bad reviews and really hope that the manufacture reads them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jarril

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, lots of attachments, long cord - What's not to love?  And the Hoover name...
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving my new vacuum. Not only is it light-weight, the "pipes" are metal rather than plastic and there are securement features that eliminate that concern about an attachment falling off in mid-use. The cord is a good length, and the variety of attachments included are far beyond what I had expected. I love that there are both upholstery and floor attachments and expect this to eliminate many of my excuses for postponing vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: It has decent sucking power and works fine but it gets tiring after using the shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: It has decent sucking power and works fine but it gets tiring after using the shoulder strap. Also cleaning the dirt bag is really messy and time consuming; it is not very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Tien Lin

product_meta.title: Hoover CH30000 PortaPower Lightweight Commercial Canister Vacuum, Orange
product_meta.description: Make your cleaning experience easier and more comfortable with the Hoover CH30000 PortaPower commercial lightweight canister vacuum cleaner! This reliable commercial vacuum can clean tight places and large spaces with its fabulous features. As a canister vacuum the CH30000 can be used for detailing as well as to extend long distances with its 33' long power cord. You can vacuum stairways, down halls, and around sharp corners with ease. At 8.3 lbs. the CH30000 canister vacuum weighs less than the average 6th grader's backpack, which is 18.4 lbs.! With its lightweight design, using the CH30000 can be a breeze and reduce fatigue. Not only does the CH30000 vacuum cleaner have a built-in blower, but it also can be used to clean up hard-to-reach places such as up draperies, upholsteries, and even in your own vehicles. The CH30000 can use both a reusable commercial cloth bag and a paper dust bag, allowing you to switch and alternate between cleaning jobs. For example, a cloth bag would most likely be used with sharper objects and paper bag for dust clean-up.
feature_bullets: Includes a reusable commercial cloth bag with paper option
Built-in blower allows you more versatility with cleaning and maintaining your home
Compact form allows you to clean tight spaces and detail small areas like the inside of a vehicle
Long 33' SJT cable length for large area vacuuming. Hush 15 Inch Bagless Upright

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
